wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Green (1846–1923) was a rugby union international who represented England in 1871 in the first international match.

response: He married Sarah Perry in 1796 giving birth to Richard Green in 1803. Following Sarah's death in 1805, George Green remarried Elizabeth Unwin giving birth to Frederick Green and Henry Green. Frederick went on to set up Frederick Green and Co., and was the father of Joseph Green and Sir Frederick Green.
